attributes.action: Make MPs subject to bedroom tax
attributes.additional_details:
As the Dept for Work And Pensions are looking to penalize the poorest in society by applying the bedroom tax for those in Social Housing.

Then the same should be applied to all those MPs who receive 'social housing' payments from the UK taxpayer to subsidize 2nd or 3rd home payments.

As the Govt keeps on telling us, we are all in this together,so its time for them to stand up and be counted.
